column4: how come when I try to run X11 it says: user not authorized to run the X server?
how come when I try to run X11 it says: user not authorized to run the X server?
how are you trying to run X11, using a terminal window?
why can't my user run x?
the user is in the video group
just a sec, let me look at mine
in your user and groups in the user tab click on your user and click properties, tell me if under the user privileges tab if you have use video acceleration, checked.
make sure Executing system administration tasks is also checked.
im in a terminal, i dont have any gui open
so sudo startx did not work?
but I dont want to run X as root
I do not know how to set your user permissions from terminal, only with a gui
